section.p: The type of material used in this treatment.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] materialType with data type Code
Identifies the type of material used in this treatment. Possible values are matUnknown; matAmalgam; matGold; matMetallic; matPorcelain; matResin; matSedative; matPFM; matGuttaPercha; matPaste; matSilverPoint; matNone etc. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] materialType with data type Code
Identifies the type of material used in this treatment. Possible values are matUnknown; matAmalgam; matGold; matMetallic; matPorcelain; matResin; matSedative; matPFM; matGuttaPercha; matPaste; matSilverPoint; matNone etc. DRM Plus Program Specific.
